title: About

title: Sri Lanka Dengue Atlas
text: Figure 1: Aggregated dengue cases by MOH area in Sri Lanka for 2025: Week 1 to Week 8. Circle size represents the total number of cases in each area, and color indicates case intensity grouped into categories: 0–100, 101–200, 201–400, 401–600, 601–800, and 801–1000. Hover over each circle to view the exact count for the MOH area.

title: Sri Lanka Dengue Atlas
text: Figure 1: Aggregated dengue cases by MOH area in Sri Lanka for 2025: Week 1 to Week 8.
